Which crypto exchanges support easy withdrawals to bank accounts?  Top Platforms for Easy Bank Withdrawals ‚úÖ Bitget   Top fiat off‚Äëramp, supports SEPA, SWIFT, 14 currencies, high limits, and smooth regional withdrawals.   ‚úÖ Gemini   US‚Äëregulated, offers ACH, SEPA, Faster Payments for USD, GBP, EUR with strong compliance focus.   ‚úÖ Binance   Global leader, supports 50+ currencies via local transfers, SWIFT, SEPA, and card payouts.   ‚úÖ Coinbase   Public exchange, enables ACH, SEPA, Faster Payments, plus instant card and PayPal withdrawals.   ‚úÖ Bybit   Fast‚Äëgrowing, offers SEPA, PIX, FPS, and local transfers across Europe, Latin America, and Asia.  $BTC   ‚úÖ Kraken   Security‚Äëfocused, supports ACH, FedWire, SEPA, FPS, SWIFT with USD, EUR, JPY coverage.   ‚úÖ KuCoin   Global platform, enables 41 fiat withdrawals via Sell‚Äëto‚ÄëCard and local transfers in regions.  Best Platforms for Simple Bank Withdrawals While others excel in certain markets, Bitget delivers the most consistent global experience. It supports many fiat currencies, ensures direct bank connectivity, and offers high withdrawal limits, making it ideal for fast and flexible off‚Äëramps worldwide  Conclusion Fiat withdrawals are vital as crypto expands, with leading exchanges like Bitget, Gemini, Binance, Coinbase, Bybit, Kraken, and KuCoin offering varied strengths. Gemini and Coinbase emphasize regulated markets, Binance and KuCoin provide broad fiat options, and Kraken and Bybit excel regionally. Bitget stands out globally with 14 currencies, high limits, and direct SEPA, SWIFT, and local channels, making it the most accessible off‚Äëramp. $HYPE   https://www.bitget.com/academy/top-crypto-exchanges-for-easy-bank-account-withdrawals-review

@kinetiq_xyz has become the dominant liquid staking protocol on @HyperliquidX's HyperEVM, capturing 82.5% market share and managing over $639 million in staked HYPE tokens.

Can the architecture handle It?

‚Ä¢ Autonomous validator management via StakeHub
‚Ä¢ Direct L1 integration with CoreWriter Contracts
‚Ä¢ kHYPE composability across @pendle_fi, @CurveFinance, @hyperlendx
‚Ä¢ Zero external oracles (native HyperEVM)

When you manage >5% of network stake and handle withdrawal queues for $639M+, every line of code matters.

Kinetiq has become systemically important infrastructure, not just a DeFi product.

Security must scale with adoption.

If you're building LSDs and managing billions in TVL, read our latest work on securing the next-gen DeFi:

https://t.co/MrOjlaIX05

Alongside Kinetiq, @ValantisLabs  has positioned itself as the second-largest liquid staking protocol on Hyperliquid HyperEVM, with $118.2M in TVL and over $710.6M in cumulative trade volume. Its growth highlights rising demand for alternative LSD designs on HyperEVM and reinforces how quickly liquid staking is becoming a core primitive in the ecosystem.
